name: Fun Ninja New super adventure
description:
How far can you get without falling down? Let's get this awesome game and check it out!

Journey a funny world jumping from one platform to the next picking up stars and trying to survive as long as you can. Collect stars, open new units, achieve a better score and have a lot of fun.

Watch out! If the force of a jump is not high enough before you decide to move on, you will fall down!

***And be warned: this game is insanely fun, cool and addictive!***
